medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had been feeling well until he woke up with the urge to have a bowel movement, initially experiencing diarrhea with brown stool. This was followed by the urgency to defecate again, resulting in red blood filling the toilet bowl. He later vomited a small amount of blood. Symptoms of weakness and light-headedness were noted, but he did not experience abdominal pain, black stools, constipation, heartburn, dysphagia, or odynophagia.

No prior gastrointestinal bleeding.
